programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Mrs. Wong arrives in town and when she discovers that Max and Phoebe are secretly on an undercover mission, she threatens to expose their superhero identities to the town unless they comply with her demands. In an attempt to find leverage against Mrs. Wong, Max and Phoebe turn Dr. Colosso back into a human, hoping he can dig up some dirt on her to stop her threats. However, things take an unexpected turn when Dr. Colosso and Mrs. Wong fall in love and decide to get married. But during the ceremony, when Mrs. Wong and Dr. Colosso both discover that the other is broke, they call off the wedding themselves. Dr. Colosso uses the dirt he gathered on Mrs. Wong to ensure that she keeps Max and Phoebes superhero identities a secret. Booch and Jinx are determined to uncover the identity of the superhero they spotted at the summer school dance. Chloe tries to dissuade them, but when they discover a mask and cape in Principal Fergusons bag, Booch and Jinx are convinced theyve found a real superhero.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each others previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When SpongeBob falls asleep on the bus and misses his stop, he unknowingly finds himself in a strange town that bears a striking resemblance to Bikini Bottom. Everyone in town looks familiar to SpongeBob, but it turns out, they are actually doppelgangers! Once SpongeBob realizes hes found himself in SpongeToms town of Tankini Top, he panics until SpongeTom quietly sends him back on a bus to Bikini Bottom. SpongeBob wakes up again and believes it was all a dream. // After a mix-up at the Salty Spitoon leaves Squidward with amnesia, he wakes up with a newfound tough guy persona, ""Crazy Legs"". Squidward causes trouble around town with a gang of Salty Spitoon patrons, culminating in him unknowingly leading the gang to ransack his own house! Once his house is completely destroyed, Squidward comes to his senses and rejects his new tough guy friends... until he gets hit in the head again and turns back into Crazy Legs.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob is bitten by DoodleBob while studying for an exam. SpongeBob shrugs it off, mistaking it for a papercut. But under the moonlight, SpongeBob turns into a mischievous creature called the WereDoodle! As the WereDoodle, he wreaks havoc all over town, doodling on everything. Mr. Krabs leads a hunt to end the chaos, but DoodleBob arrives to apologize for WereDoodles wrongdoings and lift the curse... until Mr. Krabs gets a papercut and becomes the new WereDoodle! // Its gorilla suit day! To celebrate, SpongeBob dresses up in a gorilla suit with Patrick dressed as his handler. As they run around town, people mistake SpongeBob for a real gorilla, causing panic that leads to SpongeBob being taken off to the zoo. Meanwhile, an actual gorilla escapes the zoo, running around town causing even more havoc. The mix-up is eventually cleared-just in time for Squidward to have one final run-in with another gorilla.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: In this ad-packed variety episode, The Patrick Show sells merchandise in order to fund its second season. // Patrick forces his entire family to participate in a series of different game show challenges.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Still eager to impress Captain Perfect, Max volunteers to help him with his younger sister, a headstrong girl who seems to drawn to evil. Max tries to show her the benefits of being good, but she tricks him and heads to auditions for new Mastermind henchmen. Max disguises himself and goes the auditions, too, hoping to stop her from working for a supervillain. Both he and the young girl are chosen to prove their evil and destroy Splat by Sea, but Max reveals his identity to her and talks her out of being a villain just before the restaurant is ruined. Meanwhile, Phoebe convinces BC he needs an elaborate dance-posal to ask Chloe to the school dance, but her interference does more harm than good.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe are clicking as a team, celebrating another big save, and impressing Captain Perfect with their work. However, they are unaware that the Masterminds henchman Keifer has implanted a chip in Maxs neck which makes him unwittingly commit crimes in Secret Shores. When President Kickbutt tells Phoebe and Captain Perfect what Max has been doing, she orders them to arrest him. Max escapes, and confronts Keifer about what she has been doing to him. Phoebe and Captain ultimately corner Max and remove the chip from his neck, but Max feels betrayed by his sister. Meanwhile, Chloe helps Jinx navigate a mess when he inadvertently invites both his mom and grandma to the dance as his dates.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When Leonardo finds himself the accidental hero in a subway station, saving the lives of innocent bystanders, hes thrilled by the title of HERO. This pushes him to a life of crime-fighting vigilantism, starting with putting the Purple Dragons in their place. But when hes caught on camera and his brothers and April see this Turtle-shaped hero on the news, they interrogate him: whats he up to... and can they get in on it? Now, the four Night Ninjas and April suit up and set out to rid the streets of crime in a single night. Now whats left to do? April finds a dog-napping ring thats been snatching up purebreds. Baiting the dog-nappers with a fancy pooch, the Turtles track the criminals and meet the villainous French florist known as... La Fleur! She and her band of hench-florists are using the dog-napping as a cover-up for a much larger crime. And when the Night Ninjas show up to stop her, it may be too late for Leo and his brothers as the whole thing goes up in flames... literally.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: On their way back from Lake World, the Wylde Paks get stuck in a massive traffic jam. The situation gets so dire that all the drivers have no choice but to set up camp - a camp that quickly turns into its own, self-governing, rudimentary society. Struggling with a vacuum of power, Jack is chosen as their reluctant leader, but hes determined to usher them into peace. Meanwhile, Lily catches feelings for a boy in a nearby car, but because the boys dad and Will have serious road rage beef, their romance is forbidden. // Desperate to leave their mark on Canyon Valley, Jack and Lily set out to capture the great beast of Canyon Valley Lake - a giant fish that has menaced the town for years. After being swallowed whole multiple times, Lily and Jack realize they must take a different approach, but then they hear horror stories from other townsfolk about their own run-ins with the giant fish proving that bagging the beast is an impossible task. Despite all this, Lily and Jack attempt to accomplish the impossible.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The Thundermans are excited to meet High Tide, a legendary superhero who surfaces at their door after being away on an extended mission. He explains to them that he used to live in their house, and was the Protector of Secret Shores before they were. While they enjoy hearing about his adventures, things turn when High Tide says that the house is rightfully his, and they must leave. Max and Phoebe explain that they are the towns new superheroes, and while exiting High Tide promises to do whatever it takes to regain his former position. Meanwhile, Booch has convinced Jinx to join her in a water protest at the school, but they go too far and find themselves in real danger. When High Tide shows up to rescue them, he only makes things worse, forcing the Thundermans to save the day and relieve High Tide once and for all.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max appears to have willingly switched to the villains side, prompting President Kickbutt to assign Captain Perfect as Phoebes new superhero partner. Max quickly gains the villains trust and leads Kiefer and the other henchmen to his house to fight Phoebe and Captain Perfect. During the fight, Max and Kiefer capture Phoebe and Captain Perfect. Max reveals he was never really evil, but was only pretending to gain access to the Chip-Chucker. Max and Phoebe defeat Kiefer and the henchmen, and they discover that the Chip-Chucker contains technology that leads them to the identitly of the Mastermind, who is revealed to be Lazlo Chance, B.C.s father. Chloe is anxious about going to the dance with B.C. and keeps trying to avoid him whenever a slow song comes on. Seeking help from Phoebe, she hides in the photo booth to teleport home. However, Jinx and Booch find a photo of her mid-teleport (they cannot see who did the teleporting), leading them to believe theres a superhero among them.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Mrs. Wong arrives in town and when she discovers that Max and Phoebe are secretly on an undercover mission, she threatens to expose their superhero identities to the town unless they comply with her demands. In an attempt to find leverage against Mrs. Wong, Max and Phoebe turn Dr. Colosso back into a human, hoping he can dig up some dirt on her to stop her threats. However, things take an unexpected turn when Dr. Colosso and Mrs. Wong fall in love and decide to get married. But during the ceremony, when Mrs. Wong and Dr. Colosso both discover that the other is broke, they call off the wedding themselves. Dr. Colosso uses the dirt he gathered on Mrs. Wong to ensure that she keeps Max and Phoebes superhero identities a secret. Booch and Jinx are determined to uncover the identity of the superhero they spotted at the summer school dance. Chloe tries to dissuade them, but when they discover a mask and cape in Principal Fergusons bag, Booch and Jinx are convinced theyve found a real superhero.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: iCarly is about teenager Carly who produces her own web show named iCarly along with her three friends Freddie, Sam and Gibby. The show is broadcasted from a studio Carly constructed in the flat where she lives with her 29 years old brother and guardian Spencer. While producing a webshow Carly is not looking for fame or fortune. Ideally she wants to be a role model for children and teenagers. iCarly ultimately features everything from comedy sketches and talent contests to interviews, recipes, and problem-solving.

programme.title: Victorious

But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Takes us on a roller coaster ride of music, laughter and stories geared to entertain The Chipmunks four generations of fans. Presented for the first time in glorious CGI, the series features ground-breaking animation and a new, original Chipmunk song in every episode. The series is an animated version of a prime-time sitcom and reflects the trials and tribulations of a single parent, David Seville, trying to raise six hyper-active Chipmunks. Like most parents, Daves patience will be pushed to the limit, forcing him to end most sentences in "ALVINNN!!!"

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

programme.title: Bubble Guppies
programme.desc: The series Bubble Guppies revolves around the underwater adventures of a group of mermaid-like preschoolers who life in the fictional underwater city of Bubbletucky. The episode starts with a sketch of Molly saying "Hi, its me Molly and its time for-" only to be stopped by Gil doing the subject of the show. When Gil or Molly says "Its time for Bubble Guppies!", the theme song starts. After the theme song, the Little Fish say the episodes name. Something happens when a character goes to school. After that, the school day begins and the Bubble Guppies say "Good morning, Mr. Grouper!". Later, the remaining Guppie tells Mr. Grouper about what happened earlier. He states "Lets think about it," and the characters discuss the topic. The pop song for the episode then begins.One of the Guppies will go to a shop that mostly focuses on the topic. The owner of the shop will asks questions about what he or she needs. Later, Mr. Grouper comes into the shop and says its time for lunch, and the "Lunchtime" song plays. At lunch the characters make a food joke about the subject of the episode. After lunch, another Gil and Molly sketch is shown. The Guppies do something fun which leads Mr. Grouper talking more about the topic, which leads into a dancing song. Mr. Grouper then says its time to go outside, the "Outside" song plays, and the Guppies make up a story about the topic. After this, Gil and Molly do another sketch.The Guppies go on a field trip that focuses on the topic, and the show concludes with the last Gil and Molly sketch and a shorter version of the theme song.

programme.title: Breadwinners
programme.desc: Two ducks with thin legs and round faces, SwaySway and Buhdeuce, are best friends. They fly around the water-based planet Pondgea in a rocket-powered van and deliver fresh bread to its citizens. They often find themselves in awkward and funny situations, and sometimes their workdays are quite dangerous. They find new friends, deal with opponents and have fun, making sure Pondgea always receive fresh bread on time.

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The Super Duper Bunny League is a team of bunnies who defends the world from a gallery of cartoony villains. From fighting sweet-toothed space pirates to lava monsters, they use their superpowers to protect truth, justice, and free time to chill.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Feline Fervor: King Julien is literally bounced out of his kingdom and onto the New York streets. A kindly old lady thinks hes a cat and swoops him up. Hes encroaching on anothers turf, though - the apartments already home to a feline-impersonator, a female ferret named Zoe. Julien is taken with Zoe, and puts on his best seduction moves. Will the street-smart ferret succumb to his kingly charms? Smart money says… you never know! Action Reaction: Skipper is forced to live his worst nightmare when hes doused with Inflatium and stress causes him to blow up like a balloon. Guess what this means… no more going on missions! Sitting behind a desk doing paperwork instead! Hans takes advantage of the situation and targets a massive weapons lab, and without Skipper the penguins are easily captured. How can Skipper combat the evil puffin if hes in a puffy state?

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic confronts Nine atop the Citadel and tries to convince him to save the Shatterverse. Nine refuses to listen, blinded by fury. When Nine focuses all his might on Sonic, Sonics trap is sprung! The endgame is at hand.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Nine finally sees the error of his ways, but its too late for an easy clean up. Saving the Shatterverse now will require an unthinkable sacrifice, but Sonic is determined to save all his friends, including Nine - no matter the cost.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Jasmine, and Winn take an online BFF compatibility test. To their surprise, they fail! Nobody is fazed, except for Hazel, who overthinks the results and wishes that her friends could know exactly whats in her head. Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, which lands all of them inside Hazels mind. As they go through her mind like a museum, Hazel continues to overthink everything they see. Now, Hazel must overcome her negative thoughts and battle a literal mind worm to get her friends out! // When Hazel wishes she didnt have a gap in her teeth, the Tooth Fairy fills her gap with a talking tooth, Toothica. At first, she seems like a lot of fun, but when Toothica gets Hazel in trouble with her parents and plans a party in Hazels mouth Hazel isnt invited to, Hazel decides she wants her gone! The Tooth Fairy, however, takes Toothicas side and is even set on honoring her at a gala. Hazel must find a way to prove Toothica is no good and get back her gap or be stuck with this rotten tooth forever.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The zoosters think King Julien has caused sweet old lady Gladys to slip and hurt herself, thus cutting off the special treats she brings for them. The rush to judgment condemns the protesting lemur to a mighty swat from the Rump Whomper. As the clock winds down to his unspeakable punishment only one abstains - Skippers gut inexplicably insists that King Julien is innocent. You should know better than to go against your gut. // Kowalskis dream of attending the giant invention expo INVEXPO have to be put on hold when hes laid up with broken legs. Skipper and the rest of the gang go in his place with the promise to bring him a full report. The injured bird goes stir crazy locked away in the hospital, however, and hallucinates that a dangerous Space Squid is invading! Could this be more than the fevered imaginings of the caged bird?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Takes us on a roller coaster ride of music, laughter and stories geared to entertain The Chipmunks four generations of fans. Presented for the first time in glorious CGI, the series features ground-breaking animation and a new, original Chipmunk song in every episode. The series is an animated version of a prime-time sitcom and reflects the trials and tribulations of a single parent, David Seville, trying to raise six hyper-active Chipmunks. Like most parents, Daves patience will be pushed to the limit, forcing him to end most sentences in "ALVINNN!!!"

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Littlefoot: Marlene is dying to go see a concert in the park. But, every time she leaves the zoo she becomes a feral monster! Kowalski comes to the rescue with his invention the Persona-Disentangleizer, which separates her savage nature from her regular self. The savage Marlene escapes and rampages through the city. Can the Penguins stop her before she destroys the city? Smotherly Love: Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home during a battle with Hans the Puffin. She smothers the penguins with love and nurturing, and gets her new boys to behave by playing possum whenever necessary. The battle-hardened unit devolves into a bunch of softies, opening the door for Hans to take advantage. It looks like he has the upper wing, unless someone can make a play to stop him!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Not your average bunch of teenagers, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles have been expertly trained by their anthropomorphic rat sensei, Splinter, in the art of ninjutsu. Criminals of New York beware, beneath the streets of this concrete metropolis, Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello and Raphael are waiting to put their training into practice, battling evil forces within the city and restoring peace. From petty thieves, to evil overlords, to aliens of an unfamiliar kind, New York is safe in the hands of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles!

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig
programme.desc: Does your neighbor have butt implants and a blueberry obsession? Can your best friend do ANYTHING without barfing? Welcome to Lundgren, where Sanjay Patel and Craig Slithers have the most rad-awesome adventures imaginable. From their collection of fart jars to their shared love of chicken wings, Sanjay and Craig are more than a boy and his pet snake… theyre family! Ready for the ride? Buckle up your fart baby and grab some napkins because Sanjay and Craig are about to douse you in awesome-sauce. NOICE! See you at the Frycade!

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: When Aang and his friends go to a Fire Nation town so that Aang can witness some firebending, their plan soon goes awry when its discovered that he is the Avatar. Fortunately, hes rescued by an individual who serves a firebending master named Jeong Jeong who has abandoned the Fire Nation, so Aang attempts to use this time to attempt to learn how to firebend. However, when the firebending master refuses to even see Aang, will Aang be able to prove hes ready to learn how to firebend despite the fact that he lacks discipline?

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: A famous truck blog wants to feature Optimus Prime! Robby, Hashtag, and Jawbreaker decide to help the Autobot leader prepare for the interview and photoshoot, but determine his trailer needs cleaning. They assure him theyll be back in time for the photoshoot later. Jawbreaker stays behind to coach Optimus for the interview portion while Robby and Hashtag take the trailer to be washed. The duo takes their eyes off the trailer for mere seconds and the trailer disappears! Off in the distance, they spot Aftermath with the trailer in tow. Robby and Hashtag pursue the trailer as it changes hands from Decepticon to Decepticon, suffering more and more damage as the day goes on. Robby fears Optimus reaction when he finally recovers the heavily-damaged trailer, but his siblings come to his rescue, repairing the trailer and delivering it right on time.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: As one of Aangs little detours, the group heads toward the island of Kyoshi. But soon they learn that the townspeople dont trust foreigners at all; however, when Aang proves to them that he is the Avatar they are treated as guests of honor. Katara wants to get some supplies and leave as soon as possible, while Aang is enjoying his time as a celebrity. Little do they know, though, that the Fire Nation has tracked them down. Also, Sokka meets and trains with a female warrior named Suki. Will Aang be able to save the village from the wrath of the Fire Nation?

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Плут
programme.desc: Сообразительный смельчак и бесстрашный бывший преступник по прозвищу Плут, пережив потерю близких, бандитскую юность и годы в тюрьме, в один момент круто меняет свою судьбу. Вместе с товарищем Андреем, который теперь работает начальников РОВД, он проворачивает дерзкую аферу и становится "оперативником Станиславом Бойко" – их общим другом, который год назад погиб. Новые документы, чужое имя и впервые в жизни законная работа – у Плута есть все, чтобы начать жизнь с чистого листа…

programme.title: Плут

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Харьков
programme.desc: Продолжение культового сериала на телеканале 2+2 онлайн. Все фанаты криминальных историй смогут увидеть, как будет разворачиваться сюжет в новом городе, с новыми людьми и преступлениями, которые придется раскрывать умным следователем. Особенно трудно им будут даваться дела, в которых замешаны "оборотни в погонах" - сотрудники структур, которые должны защищать граждан, а не наоборот. Телеканал 2+2 онлайн гарантирует, что новый сериал понравится вам еще больше двух предыдущие проекты, действия которых разворачивались в Одессе и Киеве. К тому же, вы сможете испытать свои силы в решение запутанных дел - вдруг, вы поймете, кто именно является преступником, раньше, чем главные герои сериала? Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Харьков
programme.desc: Продолжение культового сериала на телеканале 2+2 онлайн. Все фанаты криминальных историй смогут увидеть, как будет разворачиваться сюжет в новом городе, с новыми людьми и преступлениями, которые придется раскрывать умным следователем. Смотрите 2+2 онлайн, и узнайте все первыми!

programme.title: Экстрасенсы-детективы
programme.desc: Международная команда экстрасенсов берется за расследование! Когда нет ни одной зацепки, когда полиция бессильна, им удается распутать самые громкие дела. Чтобы вычислить убийцу, им не нужны доказательства и свидетели. Они приходят на помощь, когда уже нет надежды узнать правду. Экстрасенсы направят свои способности на помощь простым людям. Тем, чьи родные или знакомые погибли при загадочных обстоятельствах. В расследованиях принимают участие экстрасенсы из разных стран мира: Великобритании, Эстонии, Чехии, Украины, Белоруссии, России, Австралии, США, Азербайджана, Болгарии, Грузии. В каждом выпуске программы они не соревнуются, а помогают друг другу. Параллельно с парой экстрасенсов расследование ведет профессиональный криминалист. Вместе они найдут виновных и восстановят справедливость!

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Дизель-шоу
programme.desc: Каждый выпуск "Дизель-шоу" - это час настоящего народного юмора в исполнении блестящих резидентов шоу. Среди участников "Дизель-шоу" талантливые актеры, известные КВНщики и самобытные шоумены. Вся команда, бесспорно, прекрасно чувствует друг друга, а потому так легко и непринужденно дарит хорошее настроение своим зрителям. Концерты Дизель-шоу давно уже стали желанным событием в каждом городе Украины, а поэтому билеты на такие мероприятия раскупаются мгновенно. Поэтому лучше купить билеты заранее.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: На троих

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: Короли палат
programme.desc: Поликлиника- место, где спасают жизни. Здесь работают два кардинально разных брата. Их отношения иногда доводят до слез, но чаще всего слезы появляются от смеха.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Отважные
programme.desc: Сериал рассказывает о работе специального подразделения полиции, занимающегося проблемами домашнего насилия. Четыре главные героини помогают женщинам, детям и даже мужчинам, страдающим от тирании, побоев, унижений и других способов угнетения со стороны близких людей. Героини сериала будут попадать в сложные и опасные ситуации, спасая жизни и восстанавливая справедливость. Каждая женщина из этой четверки тоже прошла через насилие: у каждой – своя история, скелет в шкафу и сильная мотивация заниматься именно этим делом.

programme.title: Пришелец
programme.desc: Знакомься, это пришелец. Он попал на Землю случайно, его летающая тарелка сломалась рядом с орбитой нашей планеты. Теперь он живет в обычной украинской семье и пытается лучше понять человечество. Пока удается не очень, но пришелец не опускает... эммм... конечности. Помогать ему будет Оксана. Она работает ветеринаром, планирует будущее с парнем Колей, а еще — очень хочет, чтобы в ее жизни наконец что-то изменилось. Появление пришельца на горизонте перевернет всю ее жизнь вверх тормашками. Девушка поможет гостю адаптироваться к жизни на Земле и за это время изменится сама. Что из этого получится?

programme.title: Пришелец
programme.desc: Знакомься, это пришелец. Он попал на Землю случайно, его летающая тарелка сломалась рядом с орбитой нашей планеты. Теперь он живет в обычной украинской семье и пытается лучше понять человечество. Пока удается не очень, но пришелец не опускает... эммм... конечности. Помогать ему будет Оксана. Она работает ветеринаром, планирует будущее с парнем Колей, а еще — очень хочет, чтобы в ее жизни наконец что-то изменилось. Появление пришельца на горизонте перевернет всю ее жизнь вверх тормашками. Девушка поможет гостю адаптироваться к жизни на Земле и за это время изменится сама. Что из этого получится?

programme.title: Сдается домик у моря
programme.desc: То, что происходит в этой одесской семье, знакомо каждому. Когда герои конфликтуют, они все равно находят слова и поступки, которые показывают, что не так все плохо в нашей жизни. Ведь любые ссоры – не навсегда. С одной стороны – взаимоотношения и конфликтные ситуации, а с другой стороны – всегда сохраняется любовь. Как известно, в любом сериале должен быть главный герой; в нашем случае это хозяйка дома. Зовут её Жанна, и на ней держится вся семья. Если она уйдет, все развалится, как бывает во многих украинских семьях. Возможно, это наша модель жизни. Главная героиня очень добрая, поэтому под одной крышей живут и ее муж, и бывший муж, которого она временно приютила, дети от первого брака, ребенок от второго и ко всему прочему приезжает мама…

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Зинкевич попадается на крючок со взяткой, за ним следит "наружка", чтобы выйти на заказчика. Однако его коллег настораживает, что Зинкевич не страхуется и не прячется от слежения. Появляется идея, что он связался с криминалом не по своей воле. В Варшаве считают, что к Кресту приедет киллер, и Таран попадает под подозрение.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: На троих
programme.desc: Юмористическое скетч-шоу "На троих" - это зажигательные шутки и забавные истории, которые подсказывает сама жизнь. Персонажи "На троих" хорошо знакомы зрителям - это обычные врачи, гаишники, полицейские, офисный "планктон". Новые серии и десятки комических историй - в проекте "На троих" от актеров "Дизель Шоу"!

programme.title: Реальный секс с Юлией Гайворонской
programme.desc: Секс — это единение с любимым человеком и найвысшее наслаждение. Это искусство получать удовольствие, зная своё тело и понимая, что может нравится партнёру. Секс-эксперт Юлия Гайворонская и "Реальный Секс" поможет разобраться вам в тонкостях и многообразии сексуальных игр, развенчает мифы вокруг многих тем и поможет вашему желанию воплотиться в реальность.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: Свадьба вслепую
programme.desc: Право быть счастливым имеет каждый. Но не каждый может осуществить его. "Свадьба вслепую" - это уникальный украинский социальный проект, который поможет разбитым сердцам создать новую крепкую семью. Однако его создатели сразу предупреждают о том, что даже у самой идеальной пары на проекте не всегда гарантирован успех в развитии отношений друг с другом.

programme.title: Franču mūzikas koncerts LaVie En Rose
programme.desc: Dziedātāji Ineta Rudzīte un Ainars Bumbieris sniegs īpašu franču šansona stāstu - koncertprogrammu "La Vie en Rose", kas aizvedīs Jūs muzikālā ceļojumā pa romantiskajām Parīzes ielām, kur jūtas, māksla un mūzika saplūst vienā veselumā.

programme.title: Trīs kvadrātā
programme.desc: Atklāto sarunu cikla "Trīs kvadrātā" desmitajā raidījumā Mārtiņš Vilsons tiksies ar trīs paaudžu juveliermākslas pārstāvjiem. Jaunāko laikmetīgo mūziķu paaudzi pārstāvēs daudzsološa personība Latvijas juveliermākslā, jaunais juvelieris Matīss Daudziņš. Matīss kā rotkalis darbojas 12 gadus, darbos galvenokārt iemūžinot sudrabu, misiņu, melhioru un jaunsudrabu. Matīss ir tautā iemīļotā aktieru pāra - aktrises un pedagoģes Zanes Daudziņas un aktiera Viļa Daudziņa jaunākais dēls. Matīss dalīsies atmiņās par pirmo darbu veidošanu un ģimenes vērtībām, kādas vēlas saglabāt un iemiesot savā mākslā. Vidējās paaudzes lomā uz sarunu tiks aicināts laikmetīgo rotu mākslinieks Valdis Brože. Valdis ir Rotu Mākslas Biedrības biedrs; mākslinieks ir ieguvis vairākus apbalvojumus, tostarp starptautiskajā laikmetīgo rotu forumā Spānijā pasniegto prestižo "Autor Award" balvu. Sarunā Valdis atklās, kādi bija viņa pirmie soļi juveliermākslā un - kas ir modē šobrīd. Kā juveliermākslas leģenda sarunai pievienosies leģendāra personība Latvijas juveliermākslā Marta Krasta. Marta ir humanitāro zinātņu maģistre un pedagoģe, kā arī pirmās Latvijas privātās mākslas galerijas īpašniece. 21 gadu vecumā Marta kļuva par Latvijas Mākslinieku savienības visu laiku jaunāko biedru, kopš vidusskolas laikiem piedalījusies izstādēs Latvijā un ārpus PSRS robežāmm, darbojusies Rīgas Modeļu namā un vadījusi Tautas mākslas studiju "Sārnate". Sarunā Marta pārsteigs ar atklātiem stāstiem par neizmantotām iespējām, kas varēja pagriezt dzīvi gluži citā virzienā, un atmiņām par laikiem, kad kļuva par elitāra mākslas salona vadītāju.

programme.title: DoMMājas stāsti
programme.desc: JAUNA SEZONA! Raidījuma DoMMājas stāsti 2. sezonas 1. epizodē Aija Iesalniece sarunājas ar "Ķelmēnu" ceptuves vadītāju Rūtu Mūrnieci. Rūta ceptuvi sāka vadīt, iepriekš to neplānojusi, un arī nozari vēl ne līdz galam pārzinot. Sarunā ar Aiju viņa pastāstīs, kā mācījusies no saviem darbiniekiem, kā strādājusi pie sadarbības un ieklausīšanās komandā, kā pati meklē izaugsmes ceļus un iespējas, kā izmanto uzņēmējdarbības reģionā sniegtās priekšrocības un kas arvien rada lielākos izaicinājumus.

programme.title: Izlaušanās ar Gundegu Rozi
programme.desc: Režisors Dzintars Dreibergs sevi ir pierādījis ne tikai ar pasaules līmeņa profesionalitāti, bet arī ar apbrīnojamu drosmi uzņemties izaicinājumus, kas prasa milzu piepūli, pacietību un ārkārtīgi lielu precizitāti. Bet vispirms, protams, ir vīzija. Lielās bildes redzējums un darba virsvērtība. Viņa lielākais un līdz šim pazīstamākais darbs ir spēlfilma "Dvēseļu putenis", kuras veidošanas laikā mainījās arī pats Dzintars. Kopumā tie bija seši gadi, ko režisors ar savu komandu veltīja filmas tapšanai. Šī neapšaubāmi bija unikāla pieredze, kas vainagojusies ne tikai ar vietējo skatītāju un kritiķu atzinību, bet arī ar patiesu pasaules interesi par Latvijas valsti un tās vēsturi. Šai intervijā Dzintars dalās pārdomās par ambīcijām, darba aizkulisēm un savu īsto aicinājumu.

programme.title: As asmu muokslinīks
programme.desc: Raidījumi par Latgales māksliniekiem un to daiļradi, kuri šobrīd aktīvi darbojas Latgales kultūras jomā (gleznotāji, keramiķi, tekstilnieki, skulptori u.c. mākslinieki). Šie video sniegs ieskatu Latgales mākslas dzīvē, nointervēti 25 Latgalē dzīvojoši, zināmi mākslinieki. Raidījumā mākslinieki: Aleksandrs Nesterjuk, Ivo Folkmanis un Edgars Vronskis.

programme.title: Ceļā uz mājām
programme.desc: CEĻĀ UZ MĀJĀM jaunākajā epizodē Lauris Zalāns un Madara Kivkucāne dosies iepazīt vinila grīdas. Mācīsies tās ieklāt, uzzinās par vajadzīgajiem instrumentiem un parādīs kā to izdarīt pašu spēkiem savā īpašumā.

programme.title: Ģimenes skola
programme.desc: 2021.gadā šķirto laulību skaits Latvijā bija 41%. Tāpēc šajā raidījumā "Ģimenes skola" atbildes meklēsim uz jautājumu - kā nodzīvot "ilgi un laimīgi"? Un ko nozīmē būt vīram un sievai - kopīgs piedzīvojums vai tomēr pārbaudījums?

programme.title: Ģimenes skola
programme.desc: Latvijā Tēva diena tiek svinēta gandrīz 12 gadus. Raidījums "Ģimenes skola" viesojās Tēvu dienas svētku gājienā un šajā raidījumā atbildes meklē uz jautājumu - ko nozīmē būt tētim? Un vai tēva loma šodien ģimenēs un sabiedrībā mainās?

programme.title: Mēs varam - mēs darām!
programme.desc: Televeikala skatlogs. Iedvesmojies kā hobiju pārvērst par pelnītspējīgu biznesu. Uzzini, kas tuvākā un tālākā apkārtnē atjaunots, uzlabots un pilveidots. Seko līdz, stāstiem ar kuriem varam lepoties un iespējām, kas var būt aktuālas tieši Tev!

programme.title: Manas jaunās mājas Latgale
programme.desc: Aivars Baranovskis savulaik strādāja banku struktūrā — sākumā nesa smagos maisus ar naudu, vēlāk strādāja ar dokumentiem un projektu sagatavošanu. Tagad viņš ir mākslinieks un izstāžu kurators, kurš pēc daudziem gadiem Rīgā atgriezies dzimtajā Daugavpilī, lai veidotu radošu vidi un attīstītu laikmetīgās keramikas jomu Latgalē. Viņš ir aktīvi iesaistīts Latvijas Laikmetīgās keramikas centrā, Rotko muzejā un piedalās nozīmīgos starptautiskos projektos. Aivars nedaudz mīl skandalozas izstādes un izaicinājumus, kas liek skatītājiem domāt un diskutēt. Raidījums iepazīstina skatītājus ar Aivara profesionālo ceļu — no banku sektora un sabiedrisko attiecību jomas līdz tam, ka viņš vēlējies vairāk laika veltīt mākslai un radošajiem projektiem. Raidījums rāda, kā viņa pieredze un izglītība palīdz vadīt mākslas projektus, kurēt izstādes un veidot Latgales kultūras infrastruktūru. Aivars dalās pārdomās par identitāti, laikmetīgās mākslas potenciālu Latgalē un to, kā viņš kā kurators un mākslinieks iedvesmo vietējo sabiedrību, apvienojot estētiku, kontekstu un sabiedrības reakciju. Skatītāji uzzinās arī par Aivara radošo procesu un viņa pieeju keramikai. Video akcentē Daugavpils cietokšņa lomu kā radošo domu telpu un atklāj, kā Latgale, pateicoties Aivara darbam, var kļūt par Pasaules keramikas centru, piesaistot radošus cilvēkus un veicinot kultūras attīstību.

programme.title: Gaidām ciemos!
programme.desc: "Gaidām ciemos!" ir par dažādu valstu kultūru, vēsturi un tradīcijām. Raidījuma vadītājs Zurabs Dvaļi ceļo un aicina skatītājus kopā ar viņu pastaigāties pa skaistām vietām, novērtēt apskates vietas, apbrīnot dabu un satikt interesantus cilvēkus. Skatītāji vispirms uzzinās interesantus vēstures faktus par dažādu valstu slavenākajiem vai aizmirstākajiem reģioniem, bet pēc tam izzinās kulinārijas tradīcijas, kopā ar raidījuma viesiem gatavojot vairākus ēdienus.

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai
programme.desc: Latvijā ir brīnum skaista daba un esam čakla, strādīga tauta, raidījuma ciklā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" iepazīsim citu valstu mentalitāti, kuri dzimuši citā valstī un izvēlējušies par par savu mājvietu saukt Latviju. Pirmajā raidījumā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" dosimies uz Sedu pie Viktorijas, lai uzzinātu kā ieintegrējusies Latvijas sabiedrībā, kādiem izaicinājumiem ir pakļauta un kas viņu iedvesmo būt vienam no mums, latvietim!

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Šonedēļ raidījumā "Veselības kompass" runāsim par skaistumkopšanu! Starptautiskās CIDESCO Rīgas Kosmētikas skolas pasniedzēja Dace Brante mums pastāstīs, kādēļ būtu jāievēro piesardzība, lietojot pašgatavotas sejas un matu maskas, kā arī, ko ādas kopšanas ziņā svarīgi zināt tieši pusaudžu vecumā. Tāpat runāsim par populārajām aplikācijām, ar kuru palīdzību var noteikt kaitīgo vielu sastāvu kosmētikas līdzekļos - vai tās strādā un vai viss produktu sastāvos mums ir patiešām kaitīgs!

programme.title: Franču mūzikas koncerts LaVie En Rose
programme.desc: Dziedātāji Ineta Rudzīte un Ainars Bumbieris sniegs īpašu franču šansona stāstu - koncertprogrammu "La Vie en Rose", kas aizvedīs Jūs muzikālā ceļojumā pa romantiskajām Parīzes ielām, kur jūtas, māksla un mūzika saplūst vienā veselumā.

programme.title: As asmu muokslinīks
programme.desc: Raidījumi par Latgales māksliniekiem un to daiļradi, kuri šobrīd aktīvi darbojas Latgales kultūras jomā (gleznotāji, keramiķi, tekstilnieki, skulptori u.c. mākslinieki). Šie video sniegs ieskatu Latgales mākslas dzīvē, nointervēti 25 Latgalē dzīvojoši, zināmi mākslinieki. Raidījumā keramiķes: Una Gura, Mairita Folkmane un Kristīne Nicmane.

programme.title: Ceturtā vara
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Ceturtā vara" iezīmēsim kopējo ainu medijpratības jomā ne vien Latvijā, bet arī pasaulē. Eksperti pastāstīs par medijpratības pamatiem, no kā medijpratība ir atkarīga, vai tas ir izglītības, ticības vai pārliecības jautājums. Eksperti izskaidros mediju lomu mūsdienās un sabiedrības uzticību tiem. Raidījuma vadītājs Toms Bergs apskatīs iepriekšējos raidījumos izveidoto viltus ziņu lapu, viltus ziņu un publicētā viltus video sasniegto skatījumu skaitu un sociālo tīklu lietotāju komentārus, kā arī uzklausīs ekspertu skaidrojumus, kādas ir būtiskākās paaudžu uztveres atšķirības.

programme.title: Tikšanās vieta. Valmieras novads
programme.desc: Vēlies uzzināt kas notiek Valmieras novadā? Šis ir raidījums, kurā par to vari uzzināt visu. Aktualitātes, jaunumi un notikumi.

programme.title: Bolīvijas piezīmes
programme.desc: Uzņēmējs un ceļotājs Gundars Bojārs dodas jaunā piedzīvojumā uz Bolīviju. Viņa šīs ekspedīcijas ceļabiedrs ir Kaspars Skrastiņš. Abu dēkaiņu mērķis ir ar kājām sasniegt Andu kalnu grēdas virsotni, jeb 6000 metru augsto, ledājiem klāto Huaina Potosi virsotni. Ekspedīcijas ceļš virzās cauri Bolīvijas džungļiem, kalnu ielejām, škērsojot upes un ceļā satiekot vietējos ļaudis, kas izrāda laipnību abiem dēkaiņiem. Lai gan uzkāpšana Huaina Potosi virsotnē tiek dēvēta par vieglāk sasniedzamo 6000 metru virsotni pasaulē, ceļš līdz tai jau paņēmis vairāku cilvēku dzīvības. Abi latviešu ceļotāji ir pietiekami drosmīgi, lai nebītos nedz ledāju virsotnes nedz pa ceļam manītas pumas pēdas. Sadzīvojot ar karstumu, aukstumu, negulētām naktīm, abi ceļotāji Huaina Potosi virsotni sasniedz 7 dienās.

programme.title: Izstāsti Latvijai
programme.desc: Raidījums, kurā par sabiedrībā aktuālajām tēmām runās nozares eksperti un viedokļu līderi, savus veiksmes stāstus stāstīs uzņēmēji un tiks testēti produkti.

programme.title: Nedēļa Jēkabpilī
programme.desc: Jēkabpils aktualitātes šonedēļ.

programme.title: Runā Latgale
programme.desc: Ziņu raidījums.

programme.title: Limbažu novads rada un dara
programme.desc: Par aktualitātēm Limbažu novadā.

programme.title: Nedēļa Latvijā
programme.desc: Par aizvadītās nedēļas svarīgākajiem notikumiem Latvijas novados.

programme.title: Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai
programme.desc: Latvijā ir brīnum skaista daba un esam čakla, strādīga tauta, raidījuma ciklā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" iepazīsim citu valstu mentalitāti, kuri dzimuši citā valstī un izvēlējušies par par savu mājvietu saukt Latviju. Pirmajā raidījumā "Cittautieša dziesma Latvijai" dosimies uz Sedu pie Viktorijas, lai uzzinātu kā ieintegrējusies Latvijas sabiedrībā, kādiem izaicinājumiem ir pakļauta un kas viņu iedvesmo būt vienam no mums, latvietim!

programme.title: Manas bērnības atmiņas
programme.desc: Rundāles pils ir viena no skaistākajām vietām Latvijā. Raitis Zapackis te tiksies ar pils sirdi un dvēseli Imantu Lancmani, lai runātu par bērnības garšām, dabu, ģimeni un blēņām. Imants Lancmanis ir latviešu mākslas vēsturnieks, heraldikas, mākslas un arhitektūras pieminekļu restaurēšanas speciālists un iniciators, gleznotājs, vairāku grāmatu autors, sabiedrisks darbinieks un Triju zvaigžņu ordeņa kavalieris, galvenokārt pazīstams ar savu devumu mūža garumā Rundāles pils atjaunošanā.

programme.title: Latvijas stāsti
programme.desc: Valmierieši Mikus Frišfelds un Uģis Melders ir pieredzes bagāti pasākumu vadītāji. Uģa ikdiena saistīta ar pasākumu rīkošanu, to vizuālā tēla veidošanu, savukārt Mikus ir dziesminieks un skaņu inženieris. Ne vienmēr viņi pasākumus vada kopā, bet, ja ir uzaicināti abi, tad veido lielisku tandēmu, šarmējot ar savu improvizatoru talantu.

programme.title: Dzīve pēc bērnunama
programme.desc: Kristīne bērnu namā savas dzīves laikā ievietota divreiz. Šobrīd viņai ir 27 gadi, neskatoties uz notikušo, ir labās attiecībās ar mammu. Par Kristīnes mērķtiecību un sparu dzīvē pēc uzaugšanas iestādē liecina jau vien tas, ka ir izveidojusi savu skaistum kopšanas salonu, rakstījusi biznesa plānu, iemācījusies igauņu valodu un gājusi vairākos kuros. Taču daudzi citi pieredzes stāsti liecina - ir grūti atrast darbu, turpināt mācības, izveidot karjeru. Par to šajā epizodē. Par iespējām un šķēršļiem stāstīs Nodarbinātības valsts aģentūras karjeras konsultante Inguna Kaupuža, Biedrība Bērnu Labklājības Tīkls un komentāru sniegs arī Izglītības un zinātnes ministrija un Labklājības ministrija.

programme.title: Es palieku
programme.desc: Trešā sērija par Poltavas apgabala iedzīvotājiem. Ukrainā tapis jauns dokumentāls seriāls "Es palieku", kas stāsta par cilvēka spēku un spēju apvienot brīvprātīgo, pašvaldības un uzņēmumu centienus attīstīt Ukrainu, neatkarīgi no tā, kādos apstākļos tā šobrīd atrodas.

programme.title: Es palieku
programme.desc: Ceturtā sērija par Sumu apgabala Ohtirkas iedzīvotājiem. Ukrainā tapis jauns dokumentāls seriāls "Es palieku", kas stāsta par cilvēka spēku un spēju apvienot brīvprātīgo, pašvaldības un uzņēmumu centienus attīstīt Ukrainu, neatkarīgi no tā, kādos apstākļos tā šobrīd atrodas.

programme.title: Skats no Ventspils. Notikumi. Cilvēki. Viedokļi
programme.desc: Raidījums par notikumiem Ventspilī.

programme.title: Veselības kompass
programme.desc: Raidījums stāstīs par dažādiem ar veselību saistītiem jautājumiem, sniegs padomus un vedīs tevi ceļā uz veselīgāku dzīvesveidu, labāku pašsajūtu un priecīgāku ikdienu! Katru nedēļu uz sarunu aicināsim dažādus jomas ekspertus un kopā gan sportosim, gan apspriedīsim dažādas ar veselību saistītas tēmas, gan arī izmēģināsim daudz kā jauna un mūsu veselībai noderīga!

programme.title: Zaļā gaisma
programme.desc: Auto, drošība uz ceļa, jaunāko noteikumu un likumu skaidrojumi. Raidījumā pastāstīsim par jaunākajām aktualitātēm, kas jāzina un jāņem vērā katram autovadītājam.

programme.title: DoMMājas stāsti
programme.desc: JAUNA SEZONA! Raidījuma DoMMājas stāsti 2. sezonas 1. epizodē Aija Iesalniece sarunājas ar "Ķelmēnu" ceptuves vadītāju Rūtu Mūrnieci. Rūta ceptuvi sāka vadīt, iepriekš to neplānojusi, un arī nozari vēl ne līdz galam pārzinot. Sarunā ar Aiju viņa pastāstīs, kā mācījusies no saviem darbiniekiem, kā strādājusi pie sadarbības un ieklausīšanās komandā, kā pati meklē izaugsmes ceļus un iespējas, kā izmanto uzņēmējdarbības reģionā sniegtās priekšrocības un kas arvien rada lielākos izaicinājumus.

programme.title: Reģionālās Televīzijas piedāvā
programme.desc: 02:15 Vidzemē (Vidzemes TV); 02:30 Jēkabpils laiks (Vidusdaugavas TV); 02:45 Skats no Ventspils (Kurzemes TV); 03:00 TV Kurzeme piedāvā.

programme.title: Spried ar Delfi
programme.desc: Katru darba dienu kopā ar dažādu nozaru speciālistiem, kā arī "Delfi" un citu mediju žurnālistiem aicinām skatītājus spriest par kādu aktuālu tematu - politiķu lēmumiem un to sekām, amatpersonu rīcību un tās motīviem, pārmaiņām sabiedrībā un tās virzītām iniciatīvām, pasaulē notiekošo un tā ietekmi uz Latviju, sasniegumiem un zaudējumiem sportā, kultūras personībām un procesiem.

programme.title: Zini savas tiesības
programme.desc: Dzīvē mēdz būt dažādi iemesli un situācijas, kurās cilvēks vēlas savu īpašumu atdot citādi jeb, vienkārši sakot, "pārrakstīt" kādam citam. Kopā ar zvērinātu notāri Zani Ankravu un zvērinātu advokātu Tomu Vilni skaidrosim, kā to iespējams izdarīt juridiski korekti.

programme.title: Bolīvijas piezīmes
programme.desc: Uzņēmējs un ceļotājs Gundars Bojārs dodas jaunā piedzīvojumā uz Bolīviju. Viņa šīs ekspedīcijas ceļabiedrs ir Kaspars Skrastiņš. Abu dēkaiņu mērķis ir ar kājām sasniegt Andu kalnu grēdas virsotni, jeb 6000 metru augsto, ledājiem klāto Huaina Potosi virsotni.
